author: tmiychao
content:
<@&857649635274915900> The very last Office Hours AMA in this cohort is starting <t:1761750000:R>! It's 3PM UTC as always, be mindful of the timezone change this week. Use the opportunity to meet Barnabe and ask him questions, if you cannot make it, post them here https://github.com/eth-protocol-fellows/cohort-six/issues/482

Last chance to chat with Ethereum protocol expert and ask insightful questions, please join us to make this one count!

author: tmiychao
content: <@&857649635274915900> Last AMA starting right now! Join us https://meet.ethereum.org/epf-office-hours

author: dimitriosmitsios
content:
<@686695036733227017> <@914307919699406908> Question for Barnabe:

Is there a strategy to maintain the validator set decentralized while few entities (e.g. financial institutions) hold a very large percentage of staked eth?

Is there an actual danger that they veto some upcoming update that harms their interests?

author: nenarapsody
content: what a great closure, thanks everyone for organizing this last AMA!
